resources.string:
By using this app the User agrees to the Terms and Conditions contained herein. 

 USER's RESPONSIBILITIES 

 It is your responsibility to: 
 1. Understand the terms and conditions of this app as these may change from time to time
 2. Ensure you have an active Parking Session that is valid and can be viewed on your device whilst the vehicle is parked in the AUT carpark
 3. Monitor your parking session and leave at the appropriate time OR extend your parking Session 

 You understand that: 
 1. Parking in an AUT carpark space without a valid parking session may result in a breach notice being issued on your vehicle
 
 PARKING ENFORCEMENT 
 AUT uses the services of Parking Enforcement Services phone 0800 727 536 and Auckland Towing Company phone 09 3780780
